documentation.text:
@dev A token holder contract that will allow a beneficiary to extract the
 tokens after a given release time.
 Useful for simple vesting schedules like "advisors get all of their tokens
 after 1 year".

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "TokenTimelock: release time is before current time"

arguments.value: TokenTimelock: release time is before current time

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TokenTimelock: release time is before current time"

documentation.text: @return the time when the tokens are released.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "TokenTimelock: current time is before release time"

arguments.value: TokenTimelock: current time is before release time

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TokenTimelock: current time is before release time"

documentation.text: @notice Transfers tokens held by timelock to beneficiary.
